lyrics:
9 contributorssteve mcqueen lyricsverse 1
well i went to bed in memphis
and i woke up in hollywood
i got a quarter in my pocket
and id call you if i could
but i dont know why
i gotta fly

i still wanna have some fun
i wanna leave you feeling breathless
show you how the west was won
but i gotta fly
i gotta fly

chorus
like steve mcqueen

and im gonna make it all right woo woo
like steve mcqueen
underneath your radar screen
youll never catch me tonight woo woo

baby that was yesterday

making my big getaway

i gotta fly
see sheryl crow liveget tickets as low as 46you might also likechorus
like steve mcqueen
all i needs a fast machine
and im gonna make it all right woo woo

underneath your radar screen
youll never catch me tonight woo woo
like steve mcqueen woo woo
like steve mcqueen

verse 4

and all our pop stars look like porn

cause they dont hang out here no more

bridge
cause you can try me on my cell phone
you can page me all night long
but you wont catch this free bird
ill already be long gone
